title: ty riot for making Lux oppressive vs no mobility mid laner
body: Now that leblanc bullying is gone lets make lux E undodgable since it has a huge hitbox already.

replies.body:
It's no more undodgeable than it was before
it's just easier for people who have 200 ping to play like they have 10 ping
Do you want me to help u counter lux and woop her ass in lane? I play her more than any other champ.
Oh no! Someone is being beaten by itty witty Lux? Someone get the poor guy a sucker.
